thread.title: Wolves for sale: They're the Midlands’ best buy, says expert
thread.title_full: Wolves for sale: They're the Midlands’ best buy, says expert

title: Wolves for sale: They're the Midlands’ best buy, says expert
text: PUBLISHED: October 13, 2015 9:00 am LAST UPDATED: October 13, 2015 10:03 am Wolves for sale: They're the Midlands’ best buy, says expert Wolves would present the most attractive option among West Midlands clubs to potential buyers – because they are in the Championship, an expert in football finance has claimed. Steve Morgan bought Wolves from Sir Jack Hayward for a nominal fee of £10 in 2007 and agreed to invest £30 million over the coming years
